Diagram 4, Activity
The diagram depicts an activity in which you must indicate which wireless network technology scenario is associated with IR, RF, or Blue tooth.
Scenarios
One.Zoe checks her email at the airport.
Two.Sheldon wears his earpiece so he can talk hands-free on his cell phone.
Three.George and Cleo sit side by side at the park playing Internet chess on their PDA's.
Four.Suzanne's CD player is upstairs in her bedroom. She wears her cordless headphones to listen to music three floors down in the basement.
Five.Frederik buys three new wireless devices to attach to his desktop computer at home.
Six.Dominic changes the channel on his TV with a remote.
Seven.Helen's new cordless phone uses the 5.8 GHz range.
